Definition.name: c
Definition.desc: Sp2 C carbonyl group

Definition.name: c1
Definition.desc: Sp C

Definition.name: c2
Definition.desc: Sp2 C

Definition.name: c3
Definition.desc: Sp3 C

Definition.name: ca
Definition.desc: Sp2 C in pure aromatic systems

Definition.name: cp
Definition.desc: Head Sp2 C that connect two rings in biphenyl sys.

Definition.name: cq
Definition.desc: Head Sp2 C that connect two rings in biphenyl sys. identical to cp

Definition.name: cc_r5
Definition.desc: Sp2 carbons in non-pure aromatic systems

Definition.name: cc_r6
Definition.desc: Sp2 carbons in non-pure aromatic systems

Definition.name: cd
Definition.desc: Sp2 carbons in non-pure aromatic systems, identical to cc

Definition.name: ce
Definition.desc: Inner Sp2 carbons in conjugated systems

Definition.name: cf
Definition.desc: Inner Sp2 carbons in conjugated systems, identical to ce

Definition.name: cg
Definition.desc: Inner Sp carbons in conjugated systems

Definition.name: ch
Definition.desc: Inner Sp carbons in conjugated systems, identical to cg

Definition.name: cx
Definition.desc: Sp3 carbons in triangle systems

Definition.name: cy
Definition.desc: Sp3 carbons in square systems

Definition.name: cu
Definition.desc: Sp2 carbons in triangle systems

Definition.name: cv
Definition.desc: Sp2 carbons in square systems

Definition.name: cz
Definition.desc: Sp2 carbon in guanidine group

Definition.name: ha
Definition.desc: H bonded to aromatic carbon

Definition.name: hc
Definition.desc: H bonded to aliphatic carbon without d. group

Definition.name: h1
Definition.desc: H bonded to aliphatic carbon with 1 d. group

Definition.name: h2
Definition.desc: H bonded to aliphatic carbon with 2 d. group

Definition.name: h3
Definition.desc: H bonded to aliphatic carbon with 3 d. group

Definition.name: h4
Definition.desc: H bonded to non-sp3 carbon with 1 d. group

Definition.name: h5
Definition.desc: H bonded to non-sp3 carbon with 2 d. group

Definition.name: hn
Definition.desc: H bonded to nitrogen atoms

Definition.name: ho
Definition.desc: Hydroxyl group

Definition.name: hp
Definition.desc: H bonded to phosphate

Definition.name: hs
Definition.desc: Hydrogen bonded to sulphur

Definition.name: hw
Definition.desc: Hydrogen in water

Definition.name: hx
Definition.desc: H bonded to C next to positively charged group

Definition.name: n
Definition.desc: Sp2 nitrogen in amide groups

Definition.name: n1
Definition.desc: Sp N

Definition.name: n2
Definition.desc: aliphatic Sp2 N with two connected atoms

Definition.name: n3
Definition.desc: Sp3 N with three connected atoms

Definition.name: n4
Definition.desc: Sp3 N with four connected atoms

Definition.name: na
Definition.desc: Sp2 N with three connected atoms

Definition.name: na_r5
Definition.desc: Sp2 N with three connected atoms

Definition.name: na_r6
Definition.desc: Sp2 N with three connected atoms

Definition.name: nb
Definition.desc: Sp2 N in pure aromatic systems

Definition.name: nc_r5
Definition.desc: Sp2 N in non-pure aromatic systems

Definition.name: nc_r6
Definition.desc: Sp2 N in non-pure aromatic systems

Definition.name: nd
Definition.desc: Sp2 N in non-pure aromatic systems, identical to nc

Definition.name: ne
Definition.desc: Inner Sp2 N in conjugated systems

Definition.name: nf
Definition.desc: Inner Sp2 N in conjugated systems, identical to ne

Definition.name: nh
Definition.desc: Amine N connected one or more aromatic rings

Definition.name: no
Definition.desc: Nitro N

Definition.name: ni
Definition.desc: like n in RG3

Definition.name: nj
Definition.desc: like n in RG4

Definition.name: nk
Definition.desc: like n4/nx/ny in RG3

Definition.name: nl
Definition.desc: like n4/nx/ny in RG4

Definition.name: nm
Definition.desc: like nh in RG3

Definition.name: nn
Definition.desc: like nh in RG4

Definition.name: np
Definition.desc: like n3 in RG3

Definition.name: nq
Definition.desc: like n3 in RG4

Definition.name: o
Definition.desc: Oxygen with one connected atom

Definition.name: oh
Definition.desc: Oxygen in hydroxyl group

Definition.name: os
Definition.desc: Ether and ester oxygen

Definition.name: ow
Definition.desc: Oxygen in water

Definition.name: p2
Definition.desc: Phosphate with two connected atoms

Definition.name: p3
Definition.desc: Phosphate with three connected atoms, such as PH3

Definition.name: p4
Definition.desc: Phosphate with three connected atoms, such as O=P(CH3)2

Definition.name: p5
Definition.desc: Phosphate with four connected atoms, such as O=P(OH)3

Definition.name: pb
Definition.desc: Sp2 P in pure aromatic systems

Definition.name: pc_r5
Definition.desc: Sp2 P in non-pure aromatic system

Definition.name: pc_r6
Definition.desc: Sp2 P in non-pure aromatic system

Definition.name: pd
Definition.desc: Sp2 P in non-pure aromatic systems, identical to pc

Definition.name: pe
Definition.desc: Inner Sp2 P in conjugated systems

Definition.name: pf
Definition.desc: Inner Sp2 P in conjugated systems, identical to pe

Definition.name: px
Definition.desc: Special p4 in conjugated systems (phosphite)

Definition.name: py
Definition.desc: Special p5 in conjugated systems (phosphate)

Definition.name: s
Definition.desc: S with one connected atom

Definition.name: s2
Definition.desc: S with two connected atom, involved at least one double bond

Definition.name: s4
Definition.desc: S with three connected atoms

Definition.name: s6
Definition.desc: S with four connected atoms

Definition.name: sh
Definition.desc: Sp3 S connected with hydrogen

Definition.name: ss
Definition.desc: Sp3 S in thio-ester and thio-ether

Definition.name: sx
Definition.desc: Special s4 in conjugated systems (sulfoxide)

Definition.name: sy
Definition.desc: Special s6 in conjugated systems (sulfone)
